## useMicrosoftConsentBanner() function

Uses the Microsoft cookie consent banner. The banner code should be loaded from CDN using a script tag. <script src="https://wcpstatic.microsoft.com/mscc/lib/v2/wcp-consent.js"></script> You should also include a div for the cookie banner to render into: e.g. <div id="cookie-banner" />

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function useMicrosoftConsentBanner({ theme, elementId, onChange, }?: ConsentOptions): [Consent, () => void];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  { theme, elementId, onChange, } | [ConsentOptions](./hooks.consentoptions.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> |

<b>Returns:</b>

\[[Consent](./hooks.consent.md)<!-- -->, () =&gt; void\]

\[current consent; manageConsent function (to be used in footer)\]
